verse: In that day the Lord will take away the finery of the ankle ornaments, and the headbands, and the crescent ornaments,
the chains, and the bracelets, and the veils,
the bonnets, the leg ornaments, the sashes, perfume boxes, amulets,
festal robes, outer tunics, cloaks, purses,
hand mirrors, and undergarments, hoods, and veils.
